00054 YouBotGripper::YouBotGripper(const unsigned int jointNo, const std::string& configFilePath) {
00055   // Bouml preserved body begin 0005EFF1
00056     this->jointNumber = jointNo;
00057     this->mailboxMsgRetries = 200;
00058     this->timeTillNextMailboxUpdate = 1; //ms
00059 
00060     ethercatMaster = &(EthercatMaster::getInstance("youbot-ethercat.cfg", configFilePath));
00061     bar1.reset(new YouBotGripperBar(0, jointNo, configFilePath));
00062     bar2.reset(new YouBotGripperBar(1, jointNo, configFilePath));
00063 
00064   // Bouml preserved body end 0005EFF1
00065 }

00069   // Bouml preserved body end 0005F071
00070 }

00084 void YouBotGripper::getConfigurationParameter(GripperFirmwareVersion& parameter) const {
00085   // Bouml preserved body begin 000BEF71
00086 
00087     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg message;
00088     parameter.getYouBotMailboxMsg(message);
00089 
00090     bool unvalid = true;
00091     unsigned int retry = 0;
00092 
00093     ethercatMaster->setMailboxMsgBuffer(message, this->jointNumber);
00094     SLEEP_MILLISEC(timeTillNextMailboxUpdate);
00095 
00096     do {
00097       if (ethercatMaster->getMailboxMsgBuffer(message, this->jointNumber)) {
00098         unvalid = false;
00099       } else {
00100         SLEEP_MILLISEC(timeTillNextMailboxUpdate);
00101         retry++;
00102       }
00103     } while (retry < mailboxMsgRetries && unvalid);
00104 
00105     if (unvalid) {
00106       this->parseMailboxStatusFlags(message);
00107       throw std::runtime_error("Unable to get firmware version of the gripper");
00108       return;
00109     }
00110 
00111     char versionString[8] = {0};
00112     //  versionString[0] = message.stctInput.replyAddress;
00113     versionString[0] = message.stctInput.moduleAddress;
00114     versionString[1] = message.stctInput.status;
00115     versionString[2] = message.stctInput.commandNumber;
00116     versionString[3] = message.stctInput.value >> 24;
00117     versionString[4] = message.stctInput.value >> 16;
00118     versionString[5] = message.stctInput.value >> 8;
00119     versionString[6] = message.stctInput.value & 0xff;
00120 
00121     // LOG(warning) <<"version: "<< versionString;
00122     int controllerType = 0;
00123     float firmwareVersion = 0;
00124     sscanf(versionString, "%dV%f", &controllerType, &firmwareVersion); //KR842V20
00125 
00126 
00127     parameter.setParameter(controllerType, firmwareVersion);
00128 
00129     return;
00130   // Bouml preserved body end 000BEF71
00131 }
00132 
00133 void YouBotGripper::setConfigurationParameter(const CalibrateGripper& parameter) {
00134   // Bouml preserved body begin 00048271
00135 
00136     char index = 16; // Parameter 0 to 15 of bank 2 are password protected
00137     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg IsCalibratedReadMessage;
00138     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.moduleAddress = GRIPPER;
00139     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.commandNumber = GGP;
00140     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.typeNumber = index;
00141     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.motorNumber = USER_VARIABLE_BANK;
00142     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.value = 0;
00143     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctInput.value = 0;
00144 
00145     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg IsCalibratedSetMessage;
00146     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.moduleAddress = GRIPPER;
00147     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.commandNumber = SGP;
00148     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.typeNumber = index;
00149     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.motorNumber = USER_VARIABLE_BANK;
00150     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.value = 1;
00151     
00152 
00153     bool doCalibration = true;
00154     if (parameter.value == false) {
00155       if (!retrieveValueFromMotorContoller(IsCalibratedReadMessage)) {
00156         IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctInput.value = 0;
00157       }
00158       
00159       if (IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctInput.value == 1) {
00160         doCalibration = false;
00161       }
00162     }
00163       
00164     if(doCalibration){
00165       LOG(info) << "Calibrate Gripper";
00166  
00167       YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg message;
00168 
00169       unsigned int maxenc = 0;
00170       MaxEncoderValue maxencoder;
00171       bar1->getConfigurationParameter(maxencoder);
00172       maxencoder.getParameter(maxenc);
00173 
00174       message.stctOutput.moduleAddress = GRIPPER;
00175       message.stctOutput.commandNumber = MVP;
00176       message.stctOutput.typeNumber = 1; //move gripper relative
00177       message.stctOutput.value = -maxenc;
00178       message.stctOutput.motorNumber = 0; //move bar 0
00179       setValueToMotorContoller(message);
00180       message.stctOutput.motorNumber = 1; //move bar 1
00181       setValueToMotorContoller(message);
00182 
00183       //open gripper
00184       TargetPositionReached bar1TargetReched;
00185       TargetPositionReached bar2TargetReched;
00186       bool targetReachedBar1 = false;
00187       bool targetReachedBar2 = false;
00188 
00189       for (int i = 0; i < 40; i++) {
00190         bar1->getConfigurationParameter(bar1TargetReched);
00191         bar1TargetReched.getParameter(targetReachedBar1);
00192         bar2->getConfigurationParameter(bar2TargetReched);
00193         bar2TargetReched.getParameter(targetReachedBar2);
00194         if (targetReachedBar1 && targetReachedBar2){
00195           break;
00196         }
00197       }
00198 
00199       //close gripper
00200       message.stctOutput.moduleAddress = GRIPPER;
00201       message.stctOutput.commandNumber = MVP;
00202       message.stctOutput.typeNumber = 1; //move gripper relative
00203       message.stctOutput.value = maxenc;
00204       message.stctOutput.motorNumber = 0; //move bar 0
00205       setValueToMotorContoller(message);
00206       message.stctOutput.motorNumber = 1; //move bar 1
00207       setValueToMotorContoller(message);
00208       
00209       targetReachedBar1 = false;
00210       targetReachedBar2 = false;
00211 
00212       for (int i = 0; i < 40; i++) {
00213         bar1->getConfigurationParameter(bar1TargetReched);
00214         bar1TargetReched.getParameter(targetReachedBar1);
00215         bar2->getConfigurationParameter(bar2TargetReched);
00216         bar2TargetReched.getParameter(targetReachedBar2);
00217         if (targetReachedBar1 && targetReachedBar2)
00218           break;
00219       }
00220       
00221       //stop Gripper motor
00222       /*
00223       message.stctOutput.moduleAddress = GRIPPER;
00224       message.stctOutput.commandNumber = MST;
00225       message.stctOutput.value = 0;
00226       message.stctOutput.motorNumber = 0; //move bar 0
00227       setValueToMotorContoller(message);
00228       message.stctOutput.motorNumber = 1; //move bar 1
00229       setValueToMotorContoller(message);
00230 */
00231       
00232       // set pose to zero as reference
00233       ActualPosition actualPose;
00234       actualPose.setParameter(0);
00235       bar1->setConfigurationParameter(actualPose);
00236       bar2->setConfigurationParameter(actualPose);
00237       
00238        // set a flag in the user variable to remember that it is calibrated
00239       this->setValueToMotorContoller(IsCalibratedSetMessage);
00240     }
00241 
00242   // Bouml preserved body end 00048271
00243 }

00245 void YouBotGripper::getConfigurationParameter(YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg& parameter) const {
00246   // Bouml preserved body begin 000DE971
00247     if (!retrieveValueFromMotorContoller(parameter)) {
00248       throw JointParameterException("Unable to get parameter from the gripper");
00249     }
00250     this->parseMailboxStatusFlags(parameter);
00251   // Bouml preserved body end 000DE971
00252 }

00278 void YouBotGripper::setData(const GripperBarSpacingSetPoint& barSpacing) {
00279   // Bouml preserved body begin 0005F8F1
00280     
00281     GripperBarPositionSetPoint setpointBar1;
00282     GripperBarPositionSetPoint setpointBar2;
00283     
00284     setpointBar1.barPosition = barSpacing.barSpacing/2.0;
00285     setpointBar2.barPosition = barSpacing.barSpacing/2.0;
00286 
00287     bar1->setData(setpointBar1);
00288     bar2->setData(setpointBar2);
00289 
00290   // Bouml preserved body end 0005F8F1
00291 }

00293 void YouBotGripper::getData(GripperSensedBarSpacing& barSpacing) const {
00294   // Bouml preserved body begin 0005F971
00295     GripperSensedBarPosition bar1Position;
00296     GripperSensedBarPosition bar2Position;
00297     bar1->getData(bar1Position);
00298     bar2->getData(bar2Position);
00299     
00300     barSpacing.barSpacing = bar1Position.barPosition + bar2Position.barPosition;
00301 
00302   // Bouml preserved body end 0005F971
00303 }

00305 void YouBotGripper::open() {
00306   // Bouml preserved body begin 000E3BF1
00307    
00308     MaxEncoderValue maxEnc;
00309     unsigned int bar1MaxEncoderValue = 0;
00310     unsigned int bar2MaxEncoderValue = 0;
00311   
00312     bar1->getConfigurationParameter(maxEnc);
00313     maxEnc.getParameter(bar1MaxEncoderValue);
00314     bar2->getConfigurationParameter(maxEnc);
00315     maxEnc.getParameter(bar2MaxEncoderValue);
00316     
00317     GripperBarEncoderSetpoint setpointBar1;
00318     GripperBarEncoderSetpoint setpointBar2;
00319     setpointBar1.barEncoder = bar1MaxEncoderValue;
00320     setpointBar2.barEncoder = bar2MaxEncoderValue;
00321 
00322     bar1->setData(setpointBar1);
00323     bar2->setData(setpointBar2);
00324 
00325   // Bouml preserved body end 000E3BF1
00326 }
00327 
00328 void YouBotGripper::close() {
00329   // Bouml preserved body begin 00103D71
00330     GripperBarEncoderSetpoint setpointBar1;
00331     GripperBarEncoderSetpoint setpointBar2;
00332     setpointBar1.barEncoder = 0;
00333     setpointBar2.barEncoder = 0;
00334 
00335     bar1->setData(setpointBar1);
00336     bar2->setData(setpointBar2);
00337   // Bouml preserved body end 00103D71
00338 }

00343       throw std::runtime_error("gripper bar 1 is missing");

00358 void YouBotGripper::parseMailboxStatusFlags(const YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg& mailboxMsg) const {
00359   // Bouml preserved body begin 00075C71
00360     std::stringstream errorMessageStream;
00361     errorMessageStream << "Joint " << this->jointNumber << ": ";
00362     std::string errorMessage;
00363     errorMessage = errorMessageStream.str();
00364 
00365 
00366     switch (mailboxMsg.stctInput.status) {
00367       case NO_ERROR:
00368         break;
00369       case INVALID_COMMAND:
00370         LOG(error) << errorMessage << "Parameter name: " << mailboxMsg.parameterName << "; Command no: " << mailboxMsg.stctOutput.commandNumber << " is an invalid command!";
00371         //    throw JointParameterException(errorMessage + "invalid command");
00372         break;
00373       case WRONG_TYPE:
00374         LOG(error) << errorMessage << "Parameter name: " << mailboxMsg.parameterName << " has a wrong type!";
00375         //    throw JointParameterException(errorMessage + "wrong type");
00376         break;
00377       case INVALID_VALUE:
00378         LOG(error) << errorMessage << "Parameter name: " << mailboxMsg.parameterName << " Value: " << mailboxMsg.stctOutput.value << " is a invalid value!";
00379         //    throw JointParameterException(errorMessage + "invalid value");
00380         break;
00381       case CONFIGURATION_EEPROM_LOCKED:
00382         LOG(error) << errorMessage << "Parameter name: " << mailboxMsg.parameterName << " Configuration EEPROM locked";
00383         //    throw JointParameterException(errorMessage + "configuration EEPROM locked");
00384         break;
00385       case COMMAND_NOT_AVAILABLE:
00386         LOG(error) << errorMessage << "Parameter name: " << mailboxMsg.parameterName << "; Command no: " << mailboxMsg.stctOutput.commandNumber << "Command is not available!";
00387         //    throw JointParameterException(errorMessage + "command not available");
00388         break;
00389     }
00390 
00391 
00392   // Bouml preserved body end 00075C71
00393 }
00394 
00395 bool YouBotGripper::setValueToMotorContoller(const YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg& mailboxMsg) const {
00396   // Bouml preserved body begin 0005EF71
00397 
00398     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg mailboxMsgBuffer;
00399     mailboxMsgBuffer = mailboxMsg;
00400     bool unvalid = true;
00401     unsigned int retry = 0;
00402 
00403     ethercatMaster->setMailboxMsgBuffer(mailboxMsgBuffer, this->jointNumber);
00404     //    LOG(trace) << "set Output CommandNumber " << (int) mailboxMsgBuffer.stctOutput.commandNumber
00405     //                  << " moduleAddress " << (int) mailboxMsgBuffer.stctOutput.moduleAddress
00406     //                  << " motorNumber " << (int) mailboxMsgBuffer.stctOutput.motorNumber
00407     //                  << " typeNumber " << (int) mailboxMsgBuffer.stctOutput.typeNumber
00408     //                  << " value " << mailboxMsgBuffer.stctOutput.value;
00409 
00410     SLEEP_MILLISEC(timeTillNextMailboxUpdate);
00411 
00412     do {
00413 
00414 
00415       if (ethercatMaster->getMailboxMsgBuffer(mailboxMsgBuffer, this->jointNumber) &&
00416               mailboxMsgBuffer.stctInput.status == NO_ERROR) {
00417         unvalid = false;
00418       } else {
00419         SLEEP_MILLISEC(timeTillNextMailboxUpdate);
00420         retry++;
00421       }
00422       //      LOG(trace) << "set Input CommandNumber " << (int) mailboxMsgBuffer.stctInput.commandNumber
00423       //                  << " moduleAddress " << (int) mailboxMsgBuffer.stctInput.moduleAddress
00424       //                  << " replyAddress " << (int) mailboxMsgBuffer.stctInput.replyAddress
00425       //                  << " status " << (int) mailboxMsgBuffer.stctInput.status
00426       //                  << " value " << mailboxMsgBuffer.stctInput.value;
00427     } while (retry < mailboxMsgRetries && unvalid);
00428 
00429     if (unvalid) {
00430       this->parseMailboxStatusFlags(mailboxMsgBuffer);
00431       return false;
00432     } else {
00433       return true;
00434     }
00435 
00436   // Bouml preserved body end 0005EF71
00437 }
00438 
00439 bool YouBotGripper::retrieveValueFromMotorContoller(YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg& message) const {
00440   // Bouml preserved body begin 0005EEF1
00441 
00442     bool unvalid = true;
00443     unsigned int retry = 0;
00444 
00445     ethercatMaster->setMailboxMsgBuffer(message, this->jointNumber);
00446     //     LOG(trace) << "get Output CommandNumber " << (int) message.stctOutput.commandNumber
00447     //                  << " moduleAddress " << (int) message.stctOutput.moduleAddress
00448     //                  << " motorNumber " << (int) message.stctOutput.motorNumber
00449     //                  << " typeNumber " << (int) message.stctOutput.typeNumber
00450     //                  << " value " << message.stctOutput.value
00451     //                  << " No " << this->jointNumber;
00452 
00453     SLEEP_MILLISEC(timeTillNextMailboxUpdate);
00454 
00455     do {
00456 
00457 
00458       if (ethercatMaster->getMailboxMsgBuffer(message, this->jointNumber) &&
00459               message.stctInput.status == NO_ERROR) {
00460         unvalid = false;
00461       } else {
00462         SLEEP_MILLISEC(timeTillNextMailboxUpdate);
00463         retry++;
00464       }
00465       //      LOG(trace) << "get input CommandNumber " << (int) message.stctInput.commandNumber
00466       //                 << " moduleAddress " << (int) message.stctInput.moduleAddress
00467       //                 << " replyAddress " << (int) message.stctInput.replyAddress
00468       //                 << " status " << (int) message.stctInput.status
00469       //                 << " value " << message.stctInput.value
00470       //                 << " No " << this->jointNumber;
00471 
00472     } while (retry < mailboxMsgRetries && unvalid);
00473 
00474     if (unvalid) {
00475       this->parseMailboxStatusFlags(message);
00476       return false;
00477     } else {
00478       return true;
00479     }
00480 
00481   // Bouml preserved body end 0005EEF1
00482 }
